details.title: PROBLEM
details.content:
• Lack of resources on Local Newspapers
  • Wildfires generate realtime information
  • One Wildfire can generate multiple articles

details.title: SOLUTION
details.content:
• Newspapers can deliver a Visual Narrative
  • Low resources Tool
  • Reusable
  • Update information in Realtime
  • Quick Edition
  • Easy Updates
